title: Solving for Rate of Growth, k
text: We previously solve for g where $$g=e^{5k}$$. We can use this equation to obtain k.

title: Solving for Rate of Growth, k
text: Take natural log on both sides.

title: Solving for Rate of Growth, k
text: Divide by $$5$$ on both sides. What is k? Round to six decimal places.

title: Exponential Growth Model
text: Now that we've found $$A_0$$ and k, substitute them into the growth model, $$y=A_0 e^{k t}$$.
